title: C230 Process Grades & Acad. Eval. | Yönerge
text: Künye Bilgisini Göster Units in Charge Owner: Student Resources(ÖK) Responsibles: Suppliers Input: Supplier in Charge: Customers Output: Customer Served: Performance Indicators Reporting Period Instruction Letter Procedure Form Instruction Letter For Grades And Academic Evaluation (ISR-C230-01) Procedure For Submission Of Final Grades Into System And Change In Grades (PSR-C230-0101) Procedure For Academic Standing Evaluation (PSR-C230-0102) Procedure For Transcript Preparation (PSR-C230-0103) Grade Change Form (FSR-C23001-01) The List of Non-Graded or "I" Grade Courses (FSR-C23001-02) Grade Delay Fee Report (FSR-C23001-03) Rang Information Document (FSR-C23001-04) High Honor Certificates Delivery List (FSR-C23001-05) Transcript Request Form (FSR-C23001-10) more... Language English
